timelogExport.pageSubtitle: Filter and export timelog data to CSV format

exportInformation.title: Export Information
exportInformation.description: Guidelines for using the timelog data export feature
exportInformation.guideline1: Use the filters above to narrow down the timelog data you want to export
exportInformation.guideline2: The exported CSV file will include all timelog entries matching your selected criteria
exportInformation.guideline3: Date range filters will include entries from the start of "From" date to the end of "To" date
exportInformation.guideline4: "Show only Off the Job Records" will filter to include only off-the-job training activities
exportInformation.guideline5: If no filters are selected, all available timelog data will be exported

info.title: Important Information
info.description: These settings will be applied as the default review period for all learner types that don't have a custom review period assigned. Changes will take effect immediately after saving and will affect new review sessions going forward.
